0000	8180	LDH R1,PORT_A_ADDRESS
0001	7100	LDL R1,PORT_A_ADDRESS
0002	F01F	JSRD #CRYPTO_INIT
0003	8180	LDH R1,PORT_A_ADDRESS
0004	7100	LDL R1,PORT_A_ADDRESS
0005	F03B	JSRD #CRYPTO_READ_DATA
0006	8180	LDH R1,PORT_A_ADDRESS
0007	7100	LDL R1,PORT_A_ADDRESS
0008	8200	LDH R2,#00H
0009	7241	LDL R2,#41H
000A	F026	JSRD #CRYPTO_WRITE_DATA
000B	F05E	JSRD #CRYPTO_SEND_ACK
000C	8180	LDH R1,PORT_A_ADDRESS
000D	7100	LDL R1,PORT_A_ADDRESS
000E	F046	JSRD #CRYPTO_GET_DATA_AV
000F	8180	LDH R1,PORT_A_ADDRESS
0010	7100	LDL R1,PORT_A_ADDRESS
0011	F04A	JSRD #CRYPTO_GET_KEY_EXCHANGE
0012	8180	LDH R1,PORT_A_ADDRESS
0013	7100	LDL R1,PORT_A_ADDRESS
0014	F04E	JSRD #CRYPTO_GET_EOM
0015	D06C	JMPD #FIM
0016	9908	LD R9,R0,R8
0017	8500	LDH R5,SIZE
0018	7550	LDL R5,SIZE
0019	0650	ADD R6,R5,R0
001A	6601	SUBI R6,#01H
001B	1669	SUB R6,R6,R9
001C	E402	JMPZD #INDEX_RESET
001D	5501	ADDI R5,#01H
001E	D001	JMPD #STORE_INDEX
001F	0500	ADD R5,R0,R0
0020	A580	ST R5,R8,R0
0021	B008	RTS
0022	0201	ADD R2,R0,R1
0023	5201	ADDI R2,#01H
0024	0301	ADD R3,R0,R1
0025	5302	ADDI R3,#02H
0026	A010	ST R0,R1,R0
0027	8416	LDH R4,#16H
0028	74FF	LDL R4,#FFH
0029	A420	ST R4,R2,R0
002A	841F	LDH R4,#1FH
002B	74FF	LDL R4,#FFH
002C	A410	ST R4,R1,R0
002D	8401	LDH R4,#01H
002E	7400	LDL R4,#00H
002F	A430	ST R4,R3,R0
0030	B008	RTS
0031	0801	ADD R8,R0,R1
0032	5801	ADDI R8,#01H
0033	0701	ADD R7,R0,R1
0034	5702	ADDI R7,#02H
0035	A010	ST R0,R1,R0
0036	8416	LDH R4,#16H
0037	7400	LDL R4,#00H
0038	A680	ST R6,R8,R0
0039	841F	LDH R4,#1FH
003A	74FF	LDL R4,#FFH
003B	A410	ST R4,R1,R0
003C	8600	LDH R6,#00H
003D	76FF	LDL R6,#FFH
003E	2226	AND R2,R2,R6
003F	A270	ST R2,R7,R0
0040	B008	RTS
0041	0201	ADD R2,R0,R1
0042	5201	ADDI R2,#01H
0043	0301	ADD R3,R0,R1
0044	5302	ADDI R3,#02H
0045	A030	ST R0,R3,R0
0046	A010	ST R0,R1,R0

0048	74FF	LDL R4,#FFH
0049	A420	ST R4,R2,R0

004E	7400	LDL R4,#00H
004F	A430	ST R4,R3,R0
0050	9F30	LD R15,R3,R0
0051	8500	LDH R5,#00H
0052	75FF	LDL R5,#FFH
0053	2FF5	AND R15,R15,R5
0054	B008	RTS
0055	0201	ADD R2,R0,R1
0056	5202	ADDI R2,#02H
0057	9320	LD R3,R2,R0
0058	8402	LDH R4,#02H
0059	7400	LDL R4,#00H
005A	2F34	AND R15,R3,R4
005B	B008	RTS

005E	9320	LD R3,R2,R0

006E	7400	LDL R4,#00H

0073	74FF	LDL R4,#FFH

0078	7401	LDL R4,#01H

007C	B40E	MFL R4
007D	6501	SUBI R5,#01H
007E	D3FB	JMPD #WHILE_MUL
